content: wendell s blanket finished size as written is approximately 25 x32 additional repeats of the pattern can be added in both length and width to change the final dimensions lace pattern is a multiple of 10 if you desire the blanket to be narrower or wider subtract or add multiples of 10 to the cast on the lace pattern has a total of 32 row with 4 distinct sub-sections if terminating the lace section before reaching the 32nd row in the pattern i recommend stopping after row 8 16 or 24 to complete the motif the border is 10 stitches wide plus one extra slip_stitch for a selvedge if making the border wider you may need to add a few extra row of moss stitch at the top and bottom to ensure the borders are the same width blanket was knit with worsted weight yarn on size us 7 4 5mm and us 6 4 0mm needles pattern co 132 using larger needles row 1 rs slip 1 knit wise k1 p1 to last stitch p1 row 2 ws slip 1 knit wise k1 p1 to last stitch p1 row 3 slip 1 knit wise p1 k1 to last stitch p1 row 4 slip 1 knit wise p1 k1 to last stitch p1 row 5-12 repeat row 1-4 2 times switch to smaller needles row 13 slip 1 knit wise k1 p1 5x pm 11 repeats of row 1 of lace pattern pm k1 p1 to last stitch p1 row 14 slip 1 knit wise k1 p1 5x sm 11 repeats of row 2 of lace pattern sm k1 p1 to last stitch p1 row 15 slip 1 knit wise p1 k1 5x sm 11 repeats of row 3 of lace pattern sm p1 k1 to last stitch p1 row 16 slip 1 knit wise p1 k1 5x sm 11 repeats of row 4 of lace pattern sm p1 k1 to last stitch p1 row 17-44 slip 1 knit wise continue moss stitch in pattern for next 10 stitches sm 11 repeats of lace pattern sm continue moss stitch in pattern to last stitch p1 row 45-172 repeat row 13-44 4 times for a total of 5 repeats of lace pattern on final row remove markers switch to larger needles row 173-180 repeat row 1-4 2x row 181-183 repeat row 1-3 row 184 repeat row 4 binding off after each stitch moss stitch pattern rs knit into purl stitches and purl into knit stitches ws knit into knit stitches and purl into purl stitches lace pattern source https //www easytoknit com/2018/07/eyelet-lace-18-vine html
